I've been enjoying creating my comics and presenting them to publishers, but school is taking up a lot of my time.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing good as well, thank you!
I enjoy reading about cycling, my family is very passionate about it.
That is so cool! I love cycling as well, but I am not as skilled as your family.
They have been cycling for many years, so they are quite skilled!
I have been collecting souvenirs from my travels, which is a hobby that I have found to be very enjoyable.
That is a wonderful hobby! I enjoy traveling as well, but I have not been able to do it as much as I would like.
I have been taking my daughter to soccer games, which is a lot of fun.
That is so great! I love watching my children play sports.
I am a professional translator, which is a career that I enjoy very much.
That is an amazing career! I am sure it is very rewarding.
I have been creating comics and presenting them to publishers, but school is taking up a lot of my time.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to create comics, but I have not had the time to learn how.
I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr.
That is so nice! I am sure your welding instructor would love to have lunch with you.
